images.description: Follows Naruto Uzumaki's quest to become Hokage, navigating through personal struggles, facing powerful enemies and,

images.description: Follows Ichigo Kurosaki's journey as a Soul Reaper, battling Hollows and uncovering dark secrets to protect both the living and spirit worlds,

images.Producers: TV Tokyo, Aniplex, Dentsu, TV Tokyo Music, Studio Kelmadick, Shueisha, Studio Pierrot, Viz Media

images.description: It is an epic tale of Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew as they journey across the seas in search of the legendary treasure,

images.description: Follows Tanjiro Kamado, a young demon slayer, on his quest to avenge his family and cure his sister Nezuko, who has been turned into a demon.
